topics.body:
So I just finished my usual weekly Jump manga.
Well Bleach is currently having a big dumb zombie fight. Literally Zombies fight zombies.

Naruto remains a chore to get through. [spoiler]Obito finally died. Thank fucking Christ. And it tried to treat his death like a sad thing. HE'S A FUCKING MURDERER! THIS ENTIRE WAR IS HIS AND SASUKE'S FAULT![/spoiler]

One Piece is nearing the climax of this arc. I'm just counting the chapters until Doffy gets punched in the face.

Toriko is still fighting the giant horse named Hercules. And the final preparations for AIR are underway.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dac47063687275b5fa0000#post_53dac47063687275b5fa0000
Now I will commend them that the CGI looks pretty good.

But as someone said in the comments, the first 30 minutes of the movie looked _fine_ then afterwards it went to shit.

The first spongebob movie consisted of nothing but 2d animation, which made it special and a classic.

There was no need to turn it full CGI but for the fact of pleasing this generation. which would be fine, if it wasn't for the fact nearly _everything_ is in CGI now.

Even old Disney said they are no longer making 2D movies anymore which makes me sad.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
